components.description: A large white exclamation mark (!) symbol emoji.
components.title: White Exclamation Mark Ornament

description: A large white exclamation mark (!) symbol emoji.
title: White Exclamation Mark Ornament

version.description:
Released in October 2010, Unicode 6.0 was the first version of the Unicode Standard to support emoji.

Some characters in prior versions of Unicode were retroactively updated to provide an emoji presentation. This release was the first to introduce new characters for the sole purpose of compatability with emojis being used in Japan.

emoji_net_data.definition: White Exclamation Mark was approved as part of Unicode 6.0 in 2010 under the name “White Exclamation Mark Ornament” and added to Emoji 1.0 i http://emojipedia.org/white-exclamation-mark-ornament/
emoji_net_data.name: white exclamation mark

bn:13656011a: Feeling that something unexpected has happened.

bn:00106192a: Characterized by or producing sound of great volume or intensity

bn:00097517a: Excessively emotional, excited, aroused or angry.

bn:00096660a: Having or showing determination and energetic pursuit of your ends

bn:00096482a: Serving to caution or warn; admonitory

bn:00082637v: To give public notice, or first notice of; to make known; to publish; to proclaim.
To make known by stating or announcing.
To give public notice, or first notice of.

bn:00087808v: To arouse or bring out (eg feelings); to stimulate.

bn:00087809v: To arouse or stir up emotions or feelings.
Stir the feelings, emotions, or peace of

bn:00075413n: Feeling that something unexpected has happened.

bn:00065224n: The marks used to clarify meaning by indicating separation of words into sentences and clauses and phrases
Symbols that indicate the structure and organization of written language, as well as intonation and pauses
A written sign used to mark the structure of a written text; either in between sentences or within sentences.
A set of symbols and marks which are used to clarify meaning in text by separating strings of words into clauses, phrases and sentences.
Punctuation is "the use of spacing, conventional signs, and certain typographical devices as aids to the understanding and correct reading, both silently and aloud, of handwritten and printed texts."

bn:00080495n: A message that notifies you of a build issue.

bn:00032151n: A mark or sign by which outcry or emphatic utterance is marked; thus !; – also called an exclamation point.
Mark or sign by which outcry or emphatic utterance is marked.
The exclamation mark or exclamation point is a punctuation mark usually used after an interjection or exclamation to indicate strong feelings or high volume, and often marks the end of a sentence.
Punctuation mark “!” (used to denote excitement, surprise or shock).
A mark or sign by which outcry or emphatic utterance is marked.
A punctuation mark (!) used after an exclamation

bn:00075652n: A symbol is an object that represents, stands for, or suggests an idea, visual image, belief, action, or material entity.
Symbols are things such as particular forms or marks which represent some sort of information, an idea, a physical entity or a process but is distinct from it.
In programming, a name that represents a register, an absolute value, or a memory address (relative or absolute).
A character or glyph representing an idea, concept or object.
One or a few characters, a picture or an other concrete representation of an idea, a concept and the like.
An object that represents, stands for, or suggests an idea, belief, action, or material entity
An arbitrary sign (written or printed) that has acquired a conventional significance
Something that represents an idea, a process, or a physical entity

apple_vendor_description: The white exclamation mark emoji on Apple devices is a bold, clean symbol rendered with a smooth, slightly rounded form and a subtle shadow for emphasis. Its stark white color against a colored background (often red or blue depending on the context) makes it highly visible, conveying a sense of urgency, importance, or surprise. On Apple devices, this emoji delivers a clear and direct call for attention.
